profile:
We specialize in designing, assembling and installing:
- custom IKEA kitchens and closets
- custom Home Depot  kitchens and 
- custom built luxury kitchens

We are the perfect match for you if you'd love a new kitchen or closet but:
- you don't have DIY skills, or enough experience to tackle your vision alone,
- do have no idea where to begin,
- you're no entirely sure what you want,
- you just don't have time.

Thanks to our extensive experience, we can turn your IKEA kitchen project into an easy and stress free reality.
â€‹Ready to get started?!
Contact us!

profile:
Like many homeowners, do you struggle with home organization? A lot of homeowners don't know what the real problem is and what really creates the mess, clutter and disorganization. You don't need too many items to create a mess in your home. In fact, its much simpler than that. The problem might be lack of organizational space in your home.

At Xquisite Closets, our professional consultants will assist you in optimizing the same space you have. We will listen to you and suggest what is best for your home. It's not about the looks, its about how your home feels afterwards. Our professional designer will create for you a 3D drawing which will show how your dream Closet will look like. We will make sure you are happy and that you love the final look of your home. Whether you have an idea or not, our professional designer at Xquisite Closets is here to assist. So call us now for a Free in-home Consultation and we'll be happy to assist.

Love your Dream Closets Space & Enjoy our Lifetime Warranty.

It's simply Xquisite!

Warm Regards, 
Xquisite Closets
519-281-1000
905-598-8763
info@xquisiteclosets.ca
